## ComponentManager class

Manager for all items registered with the workspace.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ComponentManager 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addCapability(id, capability)](./blockly.componentmanager.addcapability.md) |  | Adds a capability to a existing registered component. |
|  [addComponent(componentInfo, opt\_allowOverrides)](./blockly.componentmanager.addcomponent.md) |  | Adds a component. |
|  [getComponent(id)](./blockly.componentmanager.getcomponent.md) |  | Gets the component with the given ID. |
|  [getComponents(capability, sorted)](./blockly.componentmanager.getcomponents.md) |  | Gets all the components with the specified capability. |
|  [hasCapability(id, capability)](./blockly.componentmanager.hascapability.md) |  | Returns whether the component with this id has the specified capability. |
|  [removeCapability(id, capability)](./blockly.componentmanager.removecapability.md) |  | Removes a capability from an existing registered component. |
|  [removeComponent(id)](./blockly.componentmanager.removecomponent.md) |  | Removes a component. |
